overview:
Jeff is Co-Founder & President, Operations for BenchBucket. Jeff brings strength in information technology, networking and graphic design.

Jeff graduated from Mohawk College with a Diploma in Graphic Arts. This helped kick-start his career at B.C Decker in Hamilton, Ontario, where he later became the Manager of Information Technology. Furthermore, Jeff has training in business planning and development.

Jeff has also been very active in sports over the years, having played rep hockey and baseball in his youth. Jeff was a member of two national championship winning fast pitch teams in St. Catherines, Ontario as well as having played several years of junior hockey for the St. George Dukes.
